New Records: Yuki Kawamura scored an NBA career-high 10 points
Key Match Events: Oklahoma City Thunder won 130-106 against Memphis Grizzlies
Shai Gilgeous-Alexander had a 35-point, seven-assist performance
Post-Match Reflections: Yuki Kawamura reflected on a tumultuous year of basketball
He hopes 2025 will be a year in which he can feel he's grown even more
Miscellaneous Highlights: Japan men's national team guard has been dividing his time between the Grizzlies and their developmental G-League affiliate, the Memphis Hustle
Yuki Kawamura grabbed the international spotlight at the Paris Olympics with his individual performance
Others: Yuki Kawamura played his last G-League game of 2024 on Friday
He has started all eight of his games for the Hustle, averaging 14.9 points and 9.6 assists
